q: of taking an unfair shortcut? That's a debate we imagine with rage for quite some time. Update: Microsoft's been sending out the following statement from Stefan Weitz, director of Bing: We use multiple signals and approaches in ranking search results. The overarching goal is to do a better job determining the intent of the search so we can provide the most relevant answer to a given query. Opt-in programs like the toolbar help us with clickstream data, one of many input signals we and other search engines use to help rank sites. That's pretty ambiguous, so ZDNet's Mary Jo Foley Google refocuses under Larry Page; Eric Schmidt says Microsoft is bigger competition... technology spreads. Roger Phelps, an optometrist in Ojai, Calif., says viewers who suffer the most with 3-D are those who have trouble getting their eyes to converge properly in normal life. If you tend to get carsick easily, you might be one of those, Phelps says. Triangle companies raised$ 320.6 million in venture capital last year, a 27 percent jump that outpaced the national trend. Clearly a bit taken aback by sitting next to David Letterman , Aaron Rodgers explains the game, his calm demeanor and that shiny belt they threw on him during the awards presentation. The belt has really caught on, says Aaron Rodgers of the WWE World Championship belt, complete with spinning logo.`` It's a celebration that stared during practice, and the fans love it. You've got to give them what they love.

same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. the outgoing Google chief had to say in a recent guest article for Harvard Business Review. In the piece, Eric Schmidt talks about how mobile stuff is perhaps the biggest thing at Google for 2011. As I think about Google's strategic initiatives in 2011, I realize they're all about mobile, he wrote.`` We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are,

For example, Daimler gave Chrysler managers a booklet that described the product development process- mostly in German, Sergio Marchionne said. Three-quarters of the words in the booklet were in German, Sergio Marchionne told said in his remarks.`` If you think that there's no English equivalent to a word you use in German, you're nuts.'' By 2005 Mr. Brent Scowcroft had told The New Yorker that he no longer recognized the conservative warrior who had helped lead the administration toward Baghdad. I consider Dick Cheney a good friend; I've known him for 30 years, Mr. Brent Scowcroft said then.`` But Dick Cheney I don't know anymore.'' Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a rock, he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` Rafer Alston teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where Elgin Baylor need the ball.
